title: Authors and Citation
text: Jasen Finch. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Finch J (2023). projecttemplates: Project Templates Reproducible Research Analyses. R package version 0.6.2, https://jasenfinch.github.io/projecttemplates/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {projecttemplates: Project Templates for Reproducible Research and Analyses},   author = {Jasen Finch},   year = {2023},   note = {R package version 0.6.2},   url = {https://jasenfinch.github.io/projecttemplates/}, }

what: Project Templates for Reproducible Research and Analyses
title: Project Templates for Reproducible Research and Analyses
text: Quick simple generation targets renv powered project templates reproducible research analyses.

title: Project Templates for Reproducible Research and Analyses
text: Install package GitHub using:

title: Project Templates for Reproducible Research and Analyses
text: Templates include report, manuscript presentation. following generate template report project current working directory:
code: projecttemplates::template(   'A project title',   path = '.',   type = 'report',   start = FALSE )

title: Project Templates for Reproducible Research and Analyses
text: package documentation can browsed online https://jasenfinch.github.io/projecttemplates/. believe ’ve found bug projecttemplates, please file bug (, possible, reproducible example) https://github.com/jasenfinch/projecttemplates/issues.

title: Add project .Rprofile — Rprofile
text: Add template .Rprofile file project directory.

title: Add project .Rprofile — Rprofile
text: project_directory project directory file path renv add infrastructure renv package environment management

title: Add git infrastructure — createGit
text: Add git infrastructure project directory.

title: Add git infrastructure — createGit
text: project_directory project directory file path type project type. one returned projectTypes(). ignore character vector files directories git add .gitignore created git repository.

what: Create a project GitHub repository — createGithub
title: Create a project GitHub repository — createGithub
text: Create GitHub repository project.

title: Create a project GitHub repository — createGithub
Create a project GitHub repository — createGithub
text: project_name project name/title path target file path project directory private TRUE/FALSE. GitHub repository private? Evaluated arguments git github TRUE.

title: Add docker infrastructure — docker
text: Add docker infrastructure project directory.

title: Add docker infrastructure — docker
text: project_name project name/title type project type. one returned projectTypes(). path target file path project directory renv add infrastructure renv package environment management

text: Add GitHub actions infrastructure project directory.

title: Add GitHub actions infrastructure — githubActions
text: project_name project name/title path target file path project directory

text: Add project communication outputs project directory.

title: Add project outputs — output
text: project_name project name/title project_directory project directory file path type project type. one returned projectTypes().

text: Convert project name directory path.

text: Initialise basic project directories files.

title: Project skeleton — projectSkeleton
text: project_directory project directory file path force force project creation project directory already exists

text: Available project types within projecttemplates package

title: Project README — readme
text: Export README project directory

title: Project README — readme
code: readme(project_name, path, type = projectTypes(), renv = TRUE)

title: Project README — readme
text: project_name project name/title path target file path project directory type project type. one returned projectTypes(). renv add text renv support

title: Initialise renv infrastructure — renvInitialise
text: Initialise renv infrastructure project directory.

title: Initialise renv infrastructure — renvInitialise
code: renvInitialise(   project_directory,   bioconductor = FALSE,   dependencies = character(),   sandbox = FALSE )

title: Initialise renv infrastructure — renvInitialise
text: project_directory project directory file path bioconductor version bioconductor use project. Set TRUE use default version Bioconductor. dependencies additional package dependencies install cache upon initialisation sandbox sandboxing enabled renv? See renv config documentation information sandboxing renv.

title: Add targets infrastructure — targets
text: Add targets infrastructure project directory

title: Add targets infrastructure — targets
code: targets(   project_directory,   type = projectTypes(),   targets_config = list(main = list(reporter_make = "timestamp_positives")),   renv = TRUE )

title: Add targets infrastructure — targets
text: project_directory project directory file path type project type. one returned projectTypes(). targets_config list containing targets configuration written YAML format renv interface use renv package cache

title: Project templates — template
text: Generate project template directory.

title: Project templates — template
code: template(   project_name,   path = ".",   type = projectTypes(),   renv = TRUE,   docker = TRUE,   git = TRUE,   github = TRUE,   private = TRUE,   github_actions = TRUE,   force = FALSE,   start = TRUE )

title: Project templates — template
text: project_name project name/title path target file path project directory type project type. one returned projectTypes(). renv add renv infrastructure reproducible R package environment docker TRUE/FALSE. Create project infrastructure building docker container compile project. git TRUE/FALSE. Initialise Git repository? github TRUE/FALSE. Create GitHub repository? Ignored argument git FALSE. private TRUE/FALSE. GitHub repository private? Evaluated arguments git github TRUE. github_actions TRUE/FALSE. Add Github actions infrastructure? Evaluated arguments git, github docker TRUE. force force project creation project directory already exists start TRUE/FALSE. project automatically activated new RStudio session?

title: Project templates — template
code: if (FALSE) { template('A new project',          type = 'report',          github = FALSE,          start = FALSE) }

title: Add R package settings — utils
text: Add project utilities project directory package settings.

title: Add R package settings — utils
text: project_directory project directory file path

title: projecttemplates 0.6.2
text: Fix renv Bioconductor dependencies included argument dependencies.

title: projecttemplates 0.6.1
text: Added sandbox argument renvInitialise() allow selection whether sandboxing used renv initialisation.

title: projecttemplates 0.6.0
text: template run.R script now outputs misc/run.R. template README.md now updated reflect . template misc/run.R script now outputs message console upon completion. tarchetypes package now referenced directly template targets scripts. template docker infrastructure now outputs directory misc/docker now includes image build script (/misc/docker/build_image.sh) container run script (/misc/docker/run_container.sh). jfmisc::writingChecks() now replaces manuscriptChecks() function manuscript template. renv::restore() command now moved template .Rprofile. targets package magrittr %>% now loaded via template .Rprofile. bioconductor argument replaces bioc argument renvInitialise() stipulate Bioconductor version use. Added targetsConfig() function add _targets.yaml project directory. file added automatically template() function. Fixed incorrect outputs figures, tables supplementary output Rmarkdown files manuscript template. knitr now referenced directly function calls output template Rmarkdown files.

title: projecttemplates 0.5.8
text: renv directory now included generated .dockerignore file argument renv = TRUE. RStudio project file now created even project template generated outside RStudio. Errors encountered retrieval git signature now reported git initialisation.

title: projecttemplates 0.5.7
text: Script header added generated R/utils.R file. data exports directories added generated .dockerignore file. generated _targets.R file now formatted using styler package.

title: projecttemplates 0.5.6
text: .dockerignore file now added output project ignore _targets directory present. Target build time object size now added output pipeline graph run.R. targets package options set tar_options_set() now moved utils.R.

title: projecttemplates 0.5.5
text: Fixed use user renv settings initialisation ensure user cache used. Simplified renv cache restore term generated project Dockerfile.

title: projecttemplates 0.5.4
text: Fixed warning returned directories project path exist prior template generation.

title: projecttemplates 0.5.3
text: Added pacman import ensure installed case renv = FALSE used. Project templates targets error option now set "continue" enable pipeline continue error encountered. pipeline network graph generation added generated run script.

title: projecttemplates 0.5.2
text: Removed rstudio project path Dockerfile.

title: projecttemplates 0.5.1
text: initial commit made createGit() valid git signature found. value install argument pacman loading functions can now set utils(). template(), pacman install argument utils() now dependant value renv argument. installation project package dependencies now added docker file renv argument FALSE.

title: projecttemplates 0.5.0
text: renv::restore() moved utils.R run.R. generation renv infrastructure now optional template(). project Dockerfile now generated -use R version. project Dockerfile now specific project type. package version URL now added generated files.

title: projecttemplates 0.4.6
text: Added ignore argument createGit() enable customisation files directories ignored git. _targets,data exports folders ignored git default.

title: projecttemplates 0.4.5
text: renvInitialise() now initialises project library ensure Bioconductor GitHub dependency packages installed correctly.

title: projecttemplates 0.4.4
text: Added exports directory template skeleton. Removed use BiocManager::install() installing Bioconductor packages, instead using renv::install(). rebuild argument removed template() renvInitialise(). Template project analysis outputs now directed exports directory.

title: projecttemplates 0.4.3
text: renv R package cache infrastructure now initiated using renv::init().

title: projecttemplates 0.4.2
text: CRAN, Bioconductor GitHub R packages can now specified utils(). Bioconductor GitHub R packages can now installed upon renv cache initialisation renvInitialise().

title: projecttemplates 0.4.1
text: projecttemplates::targetsScript() function now exported. run.R script now added project directory executing targets analysis projecttemplates::targetsRun(). Project creation can forced using force argument projecttemplate::template().

title: projecttemplates 0.4.0
text: docker argument projecttemplates::template() now works correctly. project templates now use targets package workflow management. Intermediate helper functions now exported. Added pkgdown site available .

title: projecttemplates 0.3.5
text: Re-added addition remote URL GitHub repo set-.

title: projecttemplates 0.3.4
text: Removed use now defunct usethis::git_credentials() usethis::github_token(). git interaction now uses gert package instead git2r.

title: projecttemplates 0.3.3
text: Added NEWS.md file track changes package. Added rebuild argument projecttemplates::template() force rebuild packages installation project renv package cache. .Rhistory now ignored git.
